content: Enrico Maria Malatesta | Department of Computing Sciences Skip to main content Open shareCloseShareClose Enrico Maria Malatesta I graduated in theoretical physics at Sapienza University of Rome under the supervision of Giorgio Parisi in 2015.I then got a PhD in physics at University of Milan in 2018, under joint supervision of Sergio Caracciolo and Giorgio Parisi.
